ul.li:
Share this discussion on
Twitter
Facebook

div.span: BGR requires you to verify your email address before posting

div.div: ⬇ Drag and drop your images here to upload them.

div.p: So, no original content of your own once again, how surprising. What fine "journalism"
Hey! At least this article didn't have anything to do with an iDevice! I found it a refreshing (disappointing, but refreshing) change!
They did throw a mention of the iPhone in there though.
Yet you couldn't help yourself anyway. I'm once again laughing at a picture of a Android phone with a Clock Widget so you can see the time twice on the same screen. Now that's funny.
Ya I never understood taking up all that space for a clock. When there is one on top of the phone.

The clock has multiple purposes. When you press the clock it opens alarms, timer, stopwatch etc. or you can customize to open any app you want. Also clicking the clouds, sun, weather etc. will open up the current weather, 5 day forecast, or any weather app you want. Obviously none of you have used an Android phone so your opinions are worthless.
His name implies his stupidity
Oh boy... *shakes head slowly at clueless person*
Top tier journalism on display right here
Indeed. I love the way they're not just features, they're "Secret" features, just to spice things up a little more. I guess it's all about clicks, not content.
Exactly... nothing secret here. These are things that most people already know unless you are completely new to Android.
Well now you know one thing about Zach's phone OS that he uses...

Don't you love it how every feature is a secret to them and every stupid thing they post they shout "you need this!!" stop telling me what I do and don't need because almost all of the time I don't need it and couldn't care less about it!
DON’T MISS: Here’s how to give your Android phone a huge speed boost, just like Apple sped up iOS. Its a breach of contract if Apple is not mentioned in every article.

Those are 10 features I thought most people already knew about. I was hoping for 10 secret features that were almost completely unknown. So misleading headline using content pulled from someplace else... did the author even try?
Click bait!
It's sad because we fell for it.
We gave them a chance time and time again.
If we never fell for it, we would never read any of them. Lol
I fell for this one too. 5 minutes I'm never gonna get back. Now teach us something we didn't already know. We at least deserve it now.
You should know by now, they never try!
"there is tons of great functionality..." You don't even have to be a journalism major to write for Bee Gee Are... or have basic writing lessons 101. Pr00freadin', what's that?
So basically it is a Popular Mechanics article written by... Z. E. for Bee Gee Are? Got it
Add tracking your movement everywhere you go, connecting to wi-fi routers even if the wi-fi function seems to be disabled in order to locate your position.
You can easily turn all those off....
If you know about them....
Android users know about them unlike the predominant users of Snapchat or iCloud...

Android is like a young college female. Open to new ideas and curious.
iOS is like and old hag. Closed minded and stubborn.
You forgot one detail about the young college girls and your Android analogy, opening her legs to anyone. Even if his name is Mall_ ware, and likes using "trojans_horse".
No, many younger women today are well educated and practice safety. Oh and older women are more prone to the dangerous virus Shingles apart from having a weaker immune system.
Don't forget about iworm, there buuuuuudy!
Yes...it's good to have an Android device, huh iSheep? How do you like them apples? Lol!
The title should read, 10 things someone who's never used an Android phone didn't know it could do.
Not all features are available on all manufacturers' versions
